text: Mehamn is a small town north in Norway. In 2020, the population in Mehamn was 761 people. Mehamn is the administration center in the municipality of Gamvik. The town has both an airport and a harbor where Hurtigruten docks. == Geography == Mehamn is located north in Norway. It is part of the municipality that lies the furthest north on the mainland of Norway. The municipality borders the municipality of Berlev√•g and Tana in the southeast, the municipality of Lebesby in the west, the Tanafjord in the east and the Barents Sea in the north. == References == Category:Towns in Norway Category:Settlements in Finnmark
title: Mehamn
